price: Those who do not believe in the verses of Allah, Allah will not guide them, and for them there will be a painful punishment.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَهۡدِيهِمُ ٱللَّهُ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
